room_title: Escape room "Escape Mars" by Escape Mars in Denver
review: Room was very cool in concept and design, but the puzzles/challenges fall very short. There was a very specific radio puzzle in the room that was insanely difficult and the margin for error was ridiculous. Two of the puzzles in the room weren't reset so once the door locked we ended up having 2 boxes open that weren't suppose to be. When this was brought the employee briefly apologized and that was the end of the conversation. There are very cool visual effects and hollywood effects that are placed in the room.

room_title: Escape room "Escape Mars" by Escape Mars in Denver
review: Great time, challenging but fun puzzles! This escape room is definitely one of my favorite.

room_title: Escape room "Escape Mars" by Escape Mars in Denver
review: This is well put together and the puzzles are clever and original. We had tons of run and highly recommend it! I was replaying it in my head for days after we tried Escape Mars!

room_title: Escape room "Escape Mars" by Escape Mars in Denver
review: Escape Mars was a solid escape room with a good mix of tech elements and challenging puzzles. So much love for what these guys put together!
